(e) We shall in the case of Your death be entitled to have a post mortem examination at Our own expense.

## POLICY OWNERS' PROTECTION SCHEME

This policy is protected under the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme which is administered by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation (SDIC). Coverage for Your policy is automatic and no further action is required from You. For more information on the types of benefits that are covered under the scheme as well as the limits of coverage, where applicable, please contact HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. or visit the GIA or SDIC websites (www.gia.org.sg or www.sdic.org.sg).

## CARING FOR OUR CUSTOMERS

HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. will make every effort to provide a high level of service expected by all Our policyholders. If on any occasion Our service falls below the standard of Your expectation, the procedure below explains what You can do:
questions: In the event of the insured's death, what are the conditions and implications of the insurer conducting a post mortem examination at their own expense, and how might this affect the claim process?

How does the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme administered by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation (SDIC) provide automatic coverage for this policy, and what are the limits and types of benefits covered under this scheme?
What steps should a policyholder take if they want detailed information about the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme coverage, including benefit types and coverage limits?
How do the protections offered by the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme interact with the insurer's obligations under this policy, especially in cases of insolvency or non-performance?
What is the role of HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. in providing information and assistance regarding the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme, and how can policyholders access this information?
In what ways does HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. commit to maintaining a high level of service for policyholders, and what procedures are in place if the service falls below expectations?
What are the formal steps a policyholder should follow if they are dissatisfied with the service provided by HL Assurance Pte. Ltd., and how might this impact their ongoing coverage or claims?
How might the insurer's right to conduct a post mortem examination influence the timing and documentation requirements for death benefit claims under this policy?
What are the potential privacy or ethical considerations related to the insurer's entitlement to a post mortem examination, and how are these balanced with the policyholder's rights?
How does the automatic nature of coverage under the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme affect new policyholders who may be unaware of this protection?
What resources are available online for policyholders to verify the protection status of their policy under the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme, and how reliable are these sources?
How might the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme coverage limits impact claims in scenarios involving large or complex benefits under this policy?
In cases where the insurer's service is deemed unsatisfactory, what are the possible remedies or escalation paths available to the policyholder according to the caring for customers procedure?
How does the insurer ensure transparency and communication regarding the post mortem examination entitlement and the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme to policyholders?
What is the significance of the insurer bearing the expense of the post mortem examination, and how does this affect the overall claim settlement process?
How do the provisions related to the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme align with regulatory requirements in Singapore for insurance policies?
What are the implications for a policyholder if HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. fails to meet the expected service standards, and how might this influence their confidence in the insurer?
How does the insurer's entitlement to a post mortem examination interact with any general exclusions or conditions in the policy related to death claims?
What information should a policyholder prepare or expect to provide when engaging with HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. regarding service complaints or inquiries about the Policy Owners' Protection Scheme?
How do the insurer's commitments under the caring for customers section enhance the overall customer experience and trust in the insurance product?
